tattoo.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a picture or writing that is permanently marked on your skin using a needle and ink
tattoo.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: He has a tattoo of a snake on his left arm.
tattoo.translation[0].definitions[1].def: an outdoor military show with music, usually at night
tattoo.translation[0].definitions[2].def: a fast continuous beating of a drum, or a sound like this
tattoo.translation[1].definitions[0].def: to mark a permanent picture or writing on someone’s skin with a needle and ink
tattoo.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: She’s got a heart tattooed on her right shoulder.
